title: Drop Dead Killers: A David Graham Thriller
description: David Graham's best friend introduced him to Cassandra Littleton. He thought they'd make a good pair and keep David from becoming involved with Alison again. Neither man knew Cassandra had an agenda of her own -- to ruin and then kill the lawyer she had married years earlier. David must find the serial killer who is targeting lawyers in a high-powered Washington, D.C. law firm. Will he realize too late he already knows the killer? Will he be able to stop Cassandra before she kills again?
author: Janet Martinez
